price: Akka inni nama jiraa ta’e akeekkachiisuufi kaafiroota irratti jechi (adabbii) mirkanaa’uuf (isa buufne).(1)
arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: (1) ka qalbiin isaa iimaanaan jiratte jechuutu itti fedhame.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqa al-qawlu ʿalā al-kāfirīna
